TopicTitle: Contractee not satisfied, kerban lawyer needed!

Articles.Content:
Lately I've been burning a lot of fuel trying to complete a mission. I was contracted to build an 11-kerbal capacity space station, and place it in solar orbit along a class E asteroid.

I went ahead and build my biggest space station yet, put it in the sky, did a low-orbit refuel and finally broke free from Kerbin.

Once I had synced up with my chosen asteroid, I realized something was off. All requirements for the contract were fulfilled, except for one. I needed to stick the station onto the asteroid, and I hadn't brought a claw..

When I finally regained motivation, I build an unmanned claw capable of docking the station and sticking it to the asteroid. It went better than I had hoped for!

However.. My contractee seems dissatisfied. They agree that I have now fulfilled the missing requirement, but at the same time they have revoked satisfaction on another requirement..

See for yourself:

![ksp_plz2.png](http://s11.postimg.org/ezh2nj22b/ksp_plz2.png)

I've tried undocking the second half of the claw (the white tank + engine facing the camera), thus leaving an open docking port. But still, they won't pay up ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Any tips or similar experiences?

Regards,

Jonathan

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-10T21:25:24Z" title="05/10/2015 09:25  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 10, 2015</time> by jamarino**
  
Changed to answered
The station has to be built after the contract has been accepted, an already existing station will not fullfill the contract requierements.

> 
> The station has to be built after the contract has been accepted, an already existing station will not fullfill the contract requierements.

That ^

Or just open the debug menu (ALT+F12) and manually complete the contract.
I dunno. When it states a docking port, does it have to be an available, unoccupied docking port?

> 
> The station has to be built after the contract has been accepted, an already existing station will not fullfill the contract requierements.

The station was build after the fact. When I first arrived at the asteroid, the requirement was fulfilled. It went back to being unfulfilled after I attached the claw module and connected with the asteroid :/

> 
> ... just open the debug menu (ALT+F12) and manually complete the contract.

Thanks for the tip ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I have been having the same issue with some contracts not wanting to complete... Just like windows says, i just alt-f12 and complete through the debug menu.
If the asteroid existed before the contract, and after docking (clawing, same thing) with the asteroid, could the contract interpret it as "it already existed before the contract was created?"

It's either needing a FREE port, or the asteroid ... if it's the latter, you MIGHT be able to fix it by undocking the claw+asteroid, then docking again with control on the claw side of things at the moment of contact.
You sure that's a class E asteroid?
